smartPhone.NAME: Anon's Smartphone
smartPhone.FLAVOR: A smartphone, always carried with her, whether in England or back home.
DESCRIPTIONS: A phone used to record daily life. You can view #yMusic Scores.
anonmod: Music Score

Guitar.NAME: Guitar
Guitar.FLAVOR: Anon's guitar, occasionally brings inspiration to its owner.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the performance, gain 1 layer of Variation.

Tomori_relic.NAME: Tomori's Band-Aid
Tomori_relic.FLAVOR: A band-aid with a cute little penguin drawing.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Tomori's help NL Gravity(3).

Soyorin_relic.NAME: Soyorin's Black Tea
Soyorin_relic.FLAVOR: The black tea that Soyorin likes, it tastes very familiar.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Soyorin's help NL Gravity(2).

Sakiko_relic.NAME: Sakiko's Headband
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Sakiko's help NL Gravity(1).

Rana_relic.NAME: Rana's Parfait Cup
Rana_relic.FLAVOR: A parfait cup used by RiNG, how did it end up here?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Rana's help NL Gravity(-1).

Rikki_relic.NAME: Rikki's Drumsticks
Rikki_relic.FLAVOR: One of the essentials for a drummer, not provided by the venue.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Rikki's help NL Gravity(0).

Mutsumi_relic.NAME: Mutsumi's Cucumber
Mutsumi_relic.FLAVOR: A cucumber, it looks very appealing.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the battle, gain Mutsumi's help NL Gravity(-2).

Anon_determination.NAME: MyGO!!!!!'s Emblem
Anon_determination.FLAVOR: Engraved with the memories of MyGO!!!!!, Chihaya Anon's determination.
DESCRIPTIONS: The [Key] to the true ending.

Crychic.NAME: Crychic's Emblem
Crychic.FLAVOR: Memories that do not belong to you.
DESCRIPTIONS: The [Key] to another ending.

Inner.NAME: InnerFavillae's Emblem
Inner.FLAVOR: The price you have paid for this, now is the time of reckoning.
DESCRIPTIONS: A non-existent badge NL The [Key] to an unknown ending.

GuitarWhiteAnon.NAME: Guitar - Asakusa and Slight Dew
GuitarWhiteAnon.FLAVOR: The star-silver one is a limited edition guitar that Anon bought in London, which has accompanied her through the most shining moments of her life.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain Gravity/ Shine, you also gain 1 layer of Shine/Gravity. When filled with rhythm, there is a chance to trigger 'Re-Production' (the probability increases with the number of battles, 1% for normal battles, 2% for elite battles, and 4% for boss battles).

StarAnonGuitar.NAME: Anon's Guitar
StarAnonGuitar.FLAVOR: Your most beloved guitar. To prevent you from getting lost, she personally customized an anchor point for you.
DESCRIPTIONS: It can perform a time reversal, returning to the finale of this journey. Use with the right mouse button.

StarAnonPocketWatch.NAME: Silver Pocket Watch
StarAnonPocketWatch.FLAVOR: It's time to set everything right!
DESCRIPTIONS: It is now responding to your strongest desire, and you will need its help at the end of this journey.

EliteAshAnonKey.NAME: Empty Guitar Case
EliteAshAnonKey.FLAVOR: No matter when and where, they are always by your side.
DESCRIPTIONS: It transforms your next non-elite fight into a special event.

FirstHalfKey.NAME: One Key
FirstHalfKey.FLAVOR: A key that appears to have a pair, unusable without the other half.
DESCRIPTIONS: Just a key, why does she have it in her hand?

SecondHalfKey.NAME: The Other Key
SecondHalfKey.FLAVOR: She hid her clues in that song, go and open a new chapter!
DESCRIPTIONS: You vaguely recall something, a sense of familiarity surrounds your heart and fingertips.

Mana_relic.NAME: Mana's Donut
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, gain Mana's help NL Gravity(0).

LastBullet.NAME: Pride
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E]. Whenever you play a card, increase the count by #y1. When the count exceeds #y600, lock your maximum HP to #y1.

FanService.NAME: Fan Service
FanService.FLAVOR: ——Congratulations, this is a reward only for long-time fans
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play fewer than 26 cards by the end of combat, randomly Upgrade a card in your deck.

FrenchFries.NAME: French Fries
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if it is a performance turn, gain an additional #y1 layer of Shine.

Gig.NAME: The Hope of Greater Kindness
Gig.FLAVOR: Wishing you a joyful gameplay experience
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use: Increase the count by 1. Defeat all current enemies.

EnergyBlessing.NAME: Energy Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E] [E].

hpBlessing.NAME: HP Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, your maximum HP is multiplied by 100, and you fully recover after each combat.

IdeaBlessing.NAME: Potion Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each combat, fill all empty potion slots with Idea Potions.

AiHeartBlessing.NAME: Power Blessing
AiHeartBlessing.FLAVOR: The belief that strides with pride
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you obtain a card, upgrade it. At the start of your turn, gain three layers of Artifact.

Mashiro.NAME: Mashiro's Mushroom
Mashiro.FLAVOR: Wait, did something just run past?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E]. You feel a bit dizzy and might experience strange hallucinations.

StarAnonBike.NAME: Anon's Bicycle
StarAnonBike.FLAVOR: A beloved item second only to the guitar.
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per act, you may perform a leap in time and space, allowing you to enter any floor within the first five floors of the current act.

PositionZero.NAME: Position Zero
PositionZero.FLAVOR: No matter how many times, I will definitely arrive...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E]. At the start of combat, gain three times the amount of Strength, Agility, and Shine; when dying, return to the stage before, and increase the count by 1.

yakusokuNoBasho.NAME: Revue Invitation
yakusokuNoBasho.FLAVOR: That tiny hope, longing for the small miracle to come true.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to use, proceed to the stage of promise.

relic.SpiritFire.NAME: Spirit Ember
DESCRIPTIONS: You can battle at rest sites.
Combat
Battle to obtain rewards.
Ruby Key
Restore %d HP
You cannot pick this up because the loadout mod is enabled.
